result_indicator_period_actual_comment_n: Comment by the PM at the EUD The current value of 32 which has been encoded by the implementer represents the number of victims in 2022 according to the records of TURMAC the Turkish Mine Action Centre  one of the end beneficiaries of the project. This figure is supported byreflected in the projects last interim progress report of April 2023 albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only.

Comment by the PM at the EUD The current value which has been encoded by the implementer was obtained by the implementer by adding 2227000 sqm of minefields which has been released and handed over by the project until the end of 2022 onto the baseline of 4310000 sqm in the reference year 2019. The value of 6537000 represents the total area in sqm of minefields cleared and handed over cumulative with baseline. The data is supported by the presentation made at the last 7th Steering Committee Meeting on 13 January 2023 by the last available project newsletter of December 2022 after the end of the last demining season end of November 2022 and by the last interim progress report of April 2023 albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only.

Comment by the PM at the EUD The current value which has been encoded by the implementer was obtained by adding 89 onto the baseline of 1. The value of 89 represents the total number of people trained under the scope of Component 2 of the project capacity building activities for TURMAC staff. The data is supported by the presentation made at the last 7th Steering Committee Meeting on 13 January 2023 and by the last interim report albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only.

Comment by the PM at the EUD The current value of 32 which has been encoded by the implementer represents the number of victims in 2022 according to the records of TURMAC the Turkish Mine Action Centre  one of the end beneficiaries of the project. This figure is supported byreflected in the projects last interim progress report of April 2023 albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only.

Comment by the PM at the EUD See also comments thread of 18 December 2022. The current value of 1127 which has been encoded by the implementer represents the total number of NTS NonTechnical Survey reports drafted approved and finalised by the end of the reporting period Y2022 under Component 4 of the project NTS. The data is supported by the last available monthly project newsletter for that year of December 2022 by the last interim progress report of April 2023 albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only and with slight adjustmentsdeductions by the presentation made at the last 7th Steering Committee Meeting on 13 January 2023 taking into account that the number of reports presented to the Steering Committee was higher i.e. 1178 as it included 2 weeks progress in January 2023.

Comment by the PM at the EUD The current value which has been encoded by the implementer was obtained by the implementer by adding 2227000 sqm of minefields which has been released and handed over by the project until the end of 2022 onto the baseline of 4310000 sqm in the reference year 2019. The value of 6537000 represents the total area in sqm of minefields cleared and handed over cumulative with baseline. The data is supported by the presentation made at the last 7th Steering Committee Meeting on 13 January 2023 by the last available project newsletter of December 2022 after the end of the last demining season end of November 2022 and by the last interim progress report of April 2023 albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only.

Comment by the PM at the EUD The current value which has been encoded by the implementer was obtained by adding 89 onto the baseline of 1. The value of 89 represents the total number of people trained under the scope of Component 2 of the project capacity building activities for TURMAC staff. The data is supported by the presentation made at the last 7th Steering Committee Meeting on 13 January 2023 and by the last interim report albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only.

Comment by the PM at the EUD The current value of 2227000  which has been encoded by the implementer  represents the total area in sqm of minefields cleared released and handed over by the project until the end of 2022 not taking into accountadding the baseline of 4310000 sqm in the reference year of 2019 under Component 1 of the project territory cleared. The data is supported by the presentation made at the last 7th Steering Committee Meeting on 13 January 2023 by the last available project newsletter of December 2022 after the end of the last demining season end of November 2022 and by the last interim progress report of April 2023 albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only.

Comment by the PM at the EUD The current value of 32 which has been encoded by the implementer represents the number of victims in 2022 according to the records of TURMAC the Turkish Mine Action Centre  one of the end beneficiaries of the project. This figure is supported byreflected in the projects last interim progress report of April 2023 albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only.

This figure is supported byreflected in the projects last interim progress report of April 2023 albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only.

Comment by the PM at the EUD See also comments thread of 18 December 2022. The current value of 1127 which has been encoded by the implementer represents the total number of NTS NonTechnical Survey reports drafted approved and finalised by the end of the reporting period Y2022 under Component 4 of the project NTS. The data is supported by the last available monthly project newsletter for that year of December 2022 by the last interim progress report of April 2023 albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only and with slight adjustmentsdeductions by the presentation made at the last 7th Steering Committee Meeting on 13 January 2023 taking into account that the number of reports presented to the Steering Committee was higher i.e. 1178 as it included 2 weeks progress in January 2023.

Comment by the PM at the EUD The current value which has been encoded by the implementer was obtained by adding 89 onto the baseline of 1. The value of 89 represents the total number of people trained under the scope of Component 2 of the project capacity building activities for TURMAC staff. The data is supported by the presentation made at the last 7th Steering Committee Meeting on 13 January 2023 and by the last interim report albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only.

Comment by the PM at the EUD The current value of 19 which has been encoded by the implementer represents the number of MRE mine risk education training sessions locations delivered completed by the contracted civil society organisation Humanitarian Mine Action Association  IMFAD under Component 3 of the project mine risk education and awareness by the end of the reporting period Y2022. Although 14 sessions were initially planned the CSO delivered sessions in 19 target locations going over the planned target. The data is supported by the last available monthly project newsletter for that year of December 2022 by the presentation made at the last 7th Steering Committee Meeting on 13 January 2023 and by the last interim progress report of April 2023 albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only.

The current value of 1127 which has been encoded by the implementer represents the total number of NTS NonTechnical Survey reports drafted approved and finalised by the end of the reporting period Y2022 under Component 4 of the project NTS. The data is supported by the last available monthly project newsletter for that year of December 2022 by the last interim progress report of April 2023 albeit in the form of a draft  not approved  version only and with slight adjustmentsdeductions by the presentation made at the last 7th Steering Committee Meeting on 13 January 2023 taking into account that the number of reports presented to the Steering Committee was higher i.e. 1178 as it included 2 weeks progress in January 2023.
